summary: Anon: ”for your dark prompts - dark!tony being creepily obsessed with the teenage boy (peter) he sees around the queens...
body:
Stalker!Tony and Victim!Peter

Anon: ”for your dark prompts - dark!tony being creepily obsessed with the teenage boy (peter) he sees around the queens neighbourhood, and one day he decides he wants the boy all to himself.”

~ 🚬🥀🔪 ~

I’ve been watching you walk

I’ve been learning the way that you talk

The back of your head is at the front of my mind

Soon I’ll crack it open just to see what’s inside your mind

Maybe I will wait until you’re fast asleep

Dreaming things I have the right to see

Maybe you are dreaming you’re in love with me

The only option left, is look and see inside your mind

I can show you the photographs

Of you getting on with life

I’ve had dreams where there’s blood on you

All of those dreams where you’re my wife

~ 🚬🥀🔪 ~

sometimes i take a break from pale pink whump and get in a dark mood ahah

tagging my comrade @starker1975

blog.description: NOT ENDGAME SPOILER FREE MY BEAN BABIES!!! || sup NERDS it's Ya pal, Birdy|| Team Tony but goddamn it I love Cap || I'm here to uh reblog shit about Doctor Strange, Iron dad and Spider Son....And I'm generally gay in this Chili's 2nite|| I mean I draw but pshh me posting? it's less likely than you think|| art tag is this bird draws|| header by docty-strange

tags: I JUST LOVE MARVEL THANK YOU
i know it may seem repetitive but what the heck this is what i love and what i see from them
title: Positive vibes only bitches
body:
seeing a lot of character hate in my dash and?? ew disgusting. so how about a post about why i love all the Marvel characters ey?

Tony: Pure bean nerd, so tired and so curious about the world around? remember that starry eyed look he had in im2 with the new element?? damn. Also do you not see him caring for inanimate objects like Dummy and U? like wow me too. he is so sentimental and cares so much but is emotionally constipated and can’t show it :/ Also just wants the world to be safe and sure, he makes mistakes but Tony Stark never makes the same mistake twice.

Steve: lawless righteous man. Loyal?? to like a fault but that doesnt remove how freaking powerful he is. he tries to do whats best for the team and it shows and he is really careful about everything. also that little weasle tried to illegally enlist his 90+ lbs asthma self to the army? wow. Steve Rogers is literally teaching us to follow ur dreams and one day you will achieve it. also? art goals.

Natasha: black widow queen baby! .like she’s so wary bcuz of red room and it probably still haunts her and she really wants to be a better person. Red ledger? she’s trying to grab a sponge and a hell of a lot of bleach to clean it out. Knows she made mistakes and is actively trying to fix it and is so strong by doing so <3 plus she will steal ur clothes if she likes you and will beat anyone up and it really shows

 Bruce: what a shy lil scientist boy. surprisingly witty and funny? like wow have you seen AoU and Ragnarok? a powerful man regardless of his green. insecurity that reeks across the room but can become so confident so quickly. 7 phds??? damn can you help me with my physics homework pleasE? also is teaching us?? that all things will get better soon and you can do it. Go past all your fears and insecurity because theres a strength inside of you that can be released so easily <3

Clint: what a hecking trickster, probably the super milder version of Loki because he has those™ vibes. honestly just tired and wants to go hope to his family and his dog named lucky. he’s?? so underrated?? and is funny and i really like this character and i hope we get to see more of him/ronin in Endgame <3

Thor: So sweet, like terrifying when he wants to be but such a bright and innocent soul. Definitely the light of the party. Im not gonna lie im really happy they took out his Shakespearean schtick and made him much more relatable and smart. like? “All words are made up” finally!! we can see him for who he really is!! 1500+ year old wise god with powerful skills but empathy. character arc!! used to be a screaming baby with goals of genocide but finally learned the true ways!! and damn if Marvel isn’t all about change. He sees a mess? and he goes and fixes it to the best of his ability

Bucky: haha 1942 science nerd. Legit went to a science expo because he likes it!! he’s also so loyal and confused and is really just tired of war and is filled with regret. He wants to be better and not be a tool. because no more! no more! he got brainwashed first so now he’s going to take control of his life and become the best person he can be!!

Sam: wow?? look at how strong this guy is. his partner died and instead of wallowing and turning to rage he just? decided to help people with PTSD? like thats some major strength right there. he literally is the type of “something bad happens to you? dont let it get you down and help others out” like wow so hecking powerful. quippy sarcastic but well-natured and i strive to be like him!! really underrated!!

T’Challa: Wakan’t do this forever but he tries. he?? took the mantle of King right after his father’s death because he knows he can’t fail everyone else. They need a ruler. And he provides that . freaking best older brother you can ask for, like?? he knows jack shit about Shuri’s references but tries to go with the flow.

Stephen: snark™ king 2.0. do no harm but take no shit. thats literally his character and i love it. really wants to try to find the most peaceful resolution to everything even though he is a major badass and can kill so many enemies so easily. character growth!! like damn he really taught us that it’s not about us. its about the others and it really shows. like wow wheres the love for this guys?

Vision: oh man everyone loves Jarvis and he?? is part of Vision and you can see the Jarvis reeking out. He’s so witty and powerful and damn. Absolute walking computer, you can ask him to play whatever song and he’ll somehow be able to do it. strikes me as a pinocchio kinda guy. i mean a sentient robot in a human world? must be kinda hard to fit in. 

Wanda: powerful goddess like damn have you even seen her?? she’s so angry with the world and with loss but is quick to change her views. she changes and thats all that matters. because people don’t stay the same way. She teaches us that it’s possible to change even though it goes against all of your beliefs. Everything that you stand for. she aims to fix her mistakes and learns from them.

Peter: PUREST BEAN. like so stressed with school, but so responsible. Well….unless you disregard all his missing backpacks. he honestly has one goal and that is to help the people. he’s literally the representation of everything we want for a leader. So capable and he knows it and just tries to reach his potential the fastest and quickest he can. plus vine refrences?? says “more expresso less depresso” despite probably disliking coffee. like damn no wonder why everyone just wants to adopt this kid. 

Rhodey: Will take none of your bullshit, he sees you with negative thoughts or whatever? will tell you that ur so hecking wrong and you better think better of yourself. so positive but so realistic. tries to do what is best and doesn’t let any silly thing like a disability bring him down. He out there ready to kick some ass and he will do it with style, man. nothing can bring him down.

Scott: World’s greatest grandma. have you seen how nice and parental he is with his daughter? like get me a dad like Scott please i beg. His whole characters surrounds around trying to be the best dad he can be to Cassie. He’s also  funny and witty and a goof but a planner. sees something that can help? will absolutely take it regardless if he knows what the hell is going on or not. he knows that people are smarter than him and won’t take offense because heck yeah you go support!! moral support!!

No hate please!! i will block anyone with any hate comments!! i dont wanna hear it!!! i love all the characters so take your hate somewhere else!!!

Im not gonna lie im really happy they took out his Shakespearean schtick and made him much more relatable and smart. like? “All words are made up” finally!! we can see him for who he really is!! 1500+ year old wise god with powerful skills but empathy. character arc!! used to be a screaming baby with goals of genocide but finally learned the true ways!! and damn if Marvel isn’t all about change. He sees a mess? and he goes and fixes it to the best of his ability

Bucky: haha 1942 science nerd. Legit went to a science expo because he likes it!! he’s also so loyal and confused and is really just tired of war and is filled with regret. He wants to be better and not be a tool. because no more! no more! he got brainwashed first so now he’s going to take control of his life and become the best person he can be!!

Sam: wow?? look at how strong this guy is. his partner died and instead of wallowing and turning to rage he just? decided to help people with PTSD? like thats some major strength right there. he literally is the type of “something bad happens to you? dont let it get you down and help others out” like wow so hecking powerful. quippy sarcastic but well-natured and i strive to be like him!! really underrated!!

T’Challa: Wakan’t do this forever but he tries. he?? took the mantle of King right after his father’s death because he knows he can’t fail everyone else. They need a ruler. And he provides that . freaking best older brother you can ask for, like?? he knows jack shit about Shuri’s references but tries to go with the flow.

Stephen: snark™ king 2.0. do no harm but take no shit. thats literally his character and i love it. really wants to try to find the most peaceful resolution to everything even though he is a major badass and can kill so many enemies so easily. character growth!! like damn he really taught us that it’s not about us. its about the others and it really shows. like wow wheres the love for this guys?

Vision: oh man everyone loves Jarvis and he?? is part of Vision and you can see the Jarvis reeking out. He’s so witty and powerful and damn. Absolute walking computer, you can ask him to play whatever song and he’ll somehow be able to do it. strikes me as a pinocchio kinda guy. i mean a sentient robot in a human world? must be kinda hard to fit in. 

Wanda: powerful goddess like damn have you even seen her?? she’s so angry with the world and with loss but is quick to change her views. she changes and thats all that matters. because people don’t stay the same way. She teaches us that it’s possible to change even though it goes against all of your beliefs. Everything that you stand for. she aims to fix her mistakes and learns from them.

Peter: PUREST BEAN. like so stressed with school, but so responsible. Well….unless you disregard all his missing backpacks. he honestly has one goal and that is to help the people. he’s literally the representation of everything we want for a leader. So capable and he knows it and just tries to reach his potential the fastest and quickest he can. plus vine refrences?? says “more expresso less depresso” despite probably disliking coffee. like damn no wonder why everyone just wants to adopt this kid. 

Rhodey: Will take none of your bullshit, he sees you with negative thoughts or whatever? will tell you that ur so hecking wrong and you better think better of yourself. so positive but so realistic. tries to do what is best and doesn’t let any silly thing like a disability bring him down. He out there ready to kick some ass and he will do it with style, man. nothing can bring him down.

Scott: World’s greatest grandma. have you seen how nice and parental he is with his daughter? like get me a dad like Scott please i beg. His whole characters surrounds around trying to be the best dad he can be to Cassie. He’s also  funny and witty and a goof but a planner. sees something that can help? will absolutely take it regardless if he knows what the hell is going on or not. he knows that people are smarter than him and won’t take offense because heck yeah you go support!! moral support!!

No hate please!! i will block anyone with any hate comments!! i dont wanna hear it!!! i love all the characters so take your hate somewhere else!!!

title: Ichor
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2EMpMn9

by Cryptand_Bismol

“He was drawn closer, his nose almost pushed up against the glass like a child at the aquarium. Minutes passed, maybe hours, or were they seconds? The hum was all around him now, somehow louder but gentle and he couldn’t pull himself away from the patterns in the water.

A flash of white amongst the dark, with a steel grey iris, a dilated pupil, a slow flicker of dark – a blink, he realised.

It was alive.

He stumbled back against the edge of the carriage, but with a blink of his own the eye was gone.”

summary: Damaged At Best (Like You've Already Figured Out)
title: Damaged At Best (Like You've Already Figured Out)
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2EA6gJ2

by JolinarJackson, Shoyzz

”Don’t come any closer,” Spider-Man said, his hand raised threateningly, his fingers resting against a trigger mechanism nestled into his palm.
”Alright,” Tony answered. For a moment, they looked at each other – Tony stuck to the wall on one side of the alley and Spider-Man stuck to the other – then Tony opened his helmet to show his face. ”Hey, there”, he said. ”Nice to finally meet you.”

—

The Avengers are left shaken in the aftermath of the Sokovia Accords. With half the team under house arrest at the Compound, Tony finds himself seeking refuge in Avengers Tower and starts forming a tentative friendship with the neighborhood vigilante Spider-Man. A friendship which is quickly threatened by Secretary Ross doubting Spider-Man’s intentions and integrity.
Tony is left wondering who to trust, especially when Spider-Man manages to uncover the one secret Tony never wanted anyone to know about: the child Tony had with a woman named Mary Fitzpatrick sixteen years ago.

summary: Hey, guys! Wanna help me with something? As you may or may not have seen, aside from my multi-chapter FrostIron fic, I now put...
body:
Hey, guys! Wanna help me with something?

As you may or may not have seen, aside from my multi-chapter FrostIron fic, I now put my first Marvel oneshot (WinterIron) onto my updating schedule and I did say I want to dive more into Marvel fics now. The problem? There are so many ships I want to write for and so many tropes I’d like to try that I am totally overwhelemed by where to start.

Send me Marvel prompts. Sentence/trope/setting/AU/word/whatever and a Tony-ship.

There something you immediately thought you’d like me to write for this fandom? Like, a coffeeshop AU with ship x? A ship you really wanna see? Now’s your chance to make me write it!

Any Tony-ship aside from Pepper0ny, IronHusb@nds, St@rker is fair game (though even beyond them I might not like the ship and just not have considered it before)!

summary: what’s your favorite headcanon of [pairing]? - ironstrange? or any others you fancy :)
question: what’s your favorite headcanon of [pairing]? - ironstrange? or any others you fancy :)
answer:
You are a darling, because I have FEELINGS™ about this! <3



Stephen and Tony are absolutely soft with each other as soon as they are alone. They aren’t much for PDA; short squeezes of each other’s hands or a quick peck on the cheek are okay, but nothing more. No. The true magic happens as soon as they are in their own four walls, just the two of them.

They will become all mushy and sappy, exchanging kisses whenever they can, innocent ones that sometimes lead to more, but more often than not are just a symbol of how much they love each other. They will cuddle and sometimes Tony’s head will rest in Stephen’s lap, his eyes closed, while Stephen works his hands gently through Tony’s hair, a book floating in front of him.

They are so disgustingly domestic it will give you cavities from its sweetness, but they need it so desperately. They are both so touch starved, it’s like applying a bandage to a wound when they can finally be like this again.

And the most intimate thing they do isn’t sex. Yes, it’s intimate and they love it, but it’s on another level. No, the most intimate thing that values the most trust between them, is when Tony gently massages Stephen’s hands, pressing soft kisses to the angry looking scars, and making sure that his love isn’t hurting.

They will cuddle and sometimes Tony’s head will rest in Stephen’s lap, his eyes closed, while Stephen works his hands gently through Tony’s hair, a book floating in front of him.

They are so disgustingly domestic it will give you cavities from its sweetness, but they need it so desperately. They are both so touch starved, it’s like applying a bandage to a wound when they can finally be like this again.

And the most intimate thing they do isn’t sex. Yes, it’s intimate and they love it, but it’s on another level. No, the most intimate thing that values the most trust between them, is when Tony gently massages Stephen’s hands, pressing soft kisses to the angry looking scars, and making sure that his love isn’t hurting.

summary: Holding Out For A Hero | James “Rhodey” Rhodes
title: Holding Out For A Hero | James “Rhodey” Rhodes
body:
Warnings: some sappy shit. a smug HYDRA guy but he gets taken care of. reader is a badass and that’s rhodey’s kink.

Pairing: James “Rhodey” Rhodes/Fem!Reader

Request: Hey I love your writing and was wondering if you could do a one shot or something where the avengers are trapped in a room and they start to hear banging and the door suddenly gets busted down and it’s some of the female agents (maybe like Sharon or Jessica Jones) and the reader who’s married to Rhodes and has super strength ? Lol sorry it came to me cuz i Love Rhodey And Tony and yeah. Sorry if not thank you for reading this :)

Word Count:  about 990 words

Never let it be said that just because Rhodey mostly made better decisions than Tony that he was completely infallible and entirely incapable of walking directly into a trap. Or, well, flying, in his case. Well, it wasn’t really like he did that to get here either since the most powerful EMP Tony had ever witnessed knocked them out of the air and straight onto the roof of the HYDRA base they were trying to take care of. When they hadn’t hit a forcefield when entering the airspace, Rhodey had thought they got lucky. That was the last time he’d ever assume luck was on his side when it came to beating up baddies. Falling onto that roof, despite the armor protecting him, still hurt like hell… Especially when he woke up.

He hadn’t even noticed how quick he’d been knocked unconscious until he was awake enough to hear his brain still rattling around in his skull. He’d initially tried to rub at his temples to soothe them, letting out a breathless groan as his eyes slowly opened, and the feeling of a strong, thick rope knotted around his wrists informed him of his current predicament.

“Tony,” He immediately groaned, hearing a rather annoyed huff from a few feet to the left of him as a wooden chair creaked under his billionaire friend’s body as he tried to yank himself loose, “I’m never going with you on a solo mission against HYDRA ever again.” It was a fib, of course, and they both knew it perfectly well, but Tony was going to let him simmer in his momentary frustration just so he could figure out a way out of here. Tony was clever like that, but also, Tony didn’t have any military training, which meant that they were essentially at the same level of knowledge and problem-solving, a fact that seemed uncommon to the point where Rhodey had begun to wonder if people pretended Tony was the only smart guy just to play a joke on the rest of them. Not his fault, of course. It was Tony’s brand to be referred to as resident genius. And where had his brand gotten them now? Stuck in HYDRA’s basement, their suits taken, tied up to chairs as they faced towards a window so dark from their side that they wouldn’t have known someone else was on the other side of it even if that person was licking the glass.

Just as the question of whether they were being watched entered Rhodey’s mind, speakers at the uppermost corners of the dim, cement-based room crackled to life.

“We have new toys to play with!” A sardonic voice came through the static as Rhodey resisted the urge to roll his eyes. Tony did it in his stead anyway.

“Baron Von Strucker will be so pleased,” the HYDRA goon crooned, their heavily accented voice echoing throughout the room as Rhodey began formulating an escape plan. One that Tony wouldn’t follow, obviously, because he seemed to be fatally allergic to plans, even if only selectively.

“Yeah, by the way, where is Baldy? We wanted to have a talk with him,” Tony replied snarkily, jutting his chin out as he remained very much stuck to his chair.

“A talk about his indoctrination of civilians into dangerous experiments while pretending to be SHIELD.” Rhodey added, tone raising challengingly even as the HYDRA agent on the other side of the glass simply laughed.

“Pretending, Colonel?” They mused. “We were SHIELD. Just, the part of it that no one knew about.”

“Yeah, uh, I’d still classify that as lying, right, Tony? Doesn’t that sound like lying to you?”

“Yup,” Tony replied without missing a beat. “So, where are our suits?”

“In holding,” the voice replied passively. “Though I would be more worried about your pliable, human flesh than your disposable exo-skeleton, Mister Stark. After all, you came with no back-up. Your pride truly precedes your forethought, Stark. Perhaps you could have handled the newborn Advanced Idea Mechanics, with a stroke of luck, but HYDRA?” They laughed. “You should have brought your precious team with you. Alas, you never were a team player… Though they’ll protect your memory from that.” Rhodey subdued a smirk at the ongoing monologue as he lifted his head again.

“You’re right. No Avengers coming to save us. That’s true,” he sighed wistfully, before looking back at the dark glass. “But you’re gonna wish it was just them.”

“What─” The talkative Nazi never got to speak another word, and Rhodey swore that there couldn’t have been timing more perfect than this. This would certainly be a story to tell.

The audio cut out after the agents in the viewing room began to scream, and there was a shaking in the floor that accompanied the brief silence that told Rhodey everything he needed to know. And then, a formerly smug man looking to be in his thirties was tossed through the thick plate of glass that previously obscured him, and as he slid across the rough, glass-covered, cement ground, another figure followed his figure out through the window pane.

“You’re serious that you’re not psychic, babe?” Rhodey grinned as his wife, with the slightest smirk on her lips, made her way over to him, flexing her hands before she successfully ripped the rope apart with her bare hands.

“Last time I checked it was just some extra muscle power, hon.” She responded, dusting her hands off as Rhodey got up from the battered metal chair and gave her a short embrace as Agent 13, also known as Sharon Carter, helped Tony out with his own restraints.

“Swear to god, you just get more and more attractive every time you kick somebody’s ass,” he teased as she snorted, pulling away from him after a moment.

“Thanks, sugar. Now, let me make you fall in love a little bit more, and we can get the Hell out of here.”

Feedback is always appreciated, even if it’s just keysmashing or heart emojis or anything at all. I love it. Every creator does.

“What─” The talkative Nazi never got to speak another word, and Rhodey swore that there couldn’t have been timing more perfect than this. This would certainly be a story to tell.

The audio cut out after the agents in the viewing room began to scream, and there was a shaking in the floor that accompanied the brief silence that told Rhodey everything he needed to know. And then, a formerly smug man looking to be in his thirties was tossed through the thick plate of glass that previously obscured him, and as he slid across the rough, glass-covered, cement ground, another figure followed his figure out through the window pane.

“You’re serious that you’re not psychic, babe?” Rhodey grinned as his wife, with the slightest smirk on her lips, made her way over to him, flexing her hands before she successfully ripped the rope apart with her bare hands.

“Last time I checked it was just some extra muscle power, hon.” She responded, dusting her hands off as Rhodey got up from the battered metal chair and gave her a short embrace as Agent 13, also known as Sharon Carter, helped Tony out with his own restraints.

“Swear to god, you just get more and more attractive every time you kick somebody’s ass,” he teased as she snorted, pulling away from him after a moment.

“Thanks, sugar. Now, let me make you fall in love a little bit more, and we can get the Hell out of here.”
